items.longDescription:
TOKYO UT

A collaboration between UT and four Japanese artists active in Japan and overseas, centered on the keyword “TOKYO.” This collection expresses the individual sensibilities of artists Meguru Yamaguchi, Kosuke Kawamura, FACE Oka, and YOSHIROTTEN.

YOSHIROTTEN

YOSHIROTTEN is a graphic artist and art director, based in Tokyo. He works across a wide spectrum of fields, including graphics, moving images, 3D works, installations and music. In 2018, after holding solo shows in London and Berlin, he mounted a massive exhibition of his works, titled “FUTURE NATURE” in Tokyo.

©YOSHIROTTEN
items.name: Tokyo UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: New “TOKYO” tees featuring designs from four up-and-coming Japanese artists

items.longDescription:
The Brands The World of Record Stores

A collaborative collection has been created with a total of 5 record stores which include "Rough Trade" in the UK and the US, "Amoeba Music" in the US, "Rush Hour" in the Netherlands, and "TECHNIQUE" and "Face Records" in Japan.

© Amoeba

items.shortDescription: This collaboration with record stores carefully selected from all over the world is a must-see for music lovers!

items.longDescription:
Haruki Murakami / Murakami Radio

Haruki Murakami is a Japanese author with fans all over the world. His novels, such as “Norwegian Wood” and “1Q84”, are widely recognized. This UT collection showcases the world of his masterpiece novels and his love for music as expressed on “Murakami Radio”.

© Haruki Murakami 2021
©Maki Sasaki 2021 by Medialynx Japan
items.name: MEN Haruki Murakami UT(Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: Introducing a collaboration between author Haruki Murakami and UT. The unique T-shirt designs feature motifs from his novels and radio program.

items.longDescription:
- Blended a comfortable cotton with 19.5 micron high-quality Merino wool.
- Machine washable for easy care.
- Revised the fit and updated to a trendy cut with an overall more relaxed feel.
- Hem ribbing that is moderately fitted. We made adjustments to make sure the waist does not feel too tight when worn tucked in.
- Collar ribbing made slightly wider, so it won't get in the way of your innerwear.
- Cotton dyed so the color has more depth.
items.name: MEN Washable Cotton Merino Crew Neck Sweater
items.shortDescription: Reviewed the design details, fabric, and color to make it a more premium and comfortable sweater.

items.longDescription:

- We performed a data analysis of indigo dyeing and mudding, which are Japanese traditional crafts, and faithfully reproduced the color for the print.
- A gusset under the sleeve makes for easier movement in every direction.
- Silhouette that is easy to wear not only for sports but also for casual situations.
items.name: MEN DRY-EX Printed Crew Neck Short Sleeve T-Shirt
items.shortDescription: Incredibly quick-drying, smooth, and feels fresh. The perfect fit for every situation with carefully selected coloring.

items.longDescription:
- Ultra stretch fabric with a stretch rate of over 1.5x horizontally and vertically, and a recovery rate of over 180%.
- Quick-drying functions approved by athletes. It dries in roughly half the time it takes for cotton to dry, so you stay feeling fresh.
- Sleek design with a more narrow-looking front zipper.
- Zip pocket that keeps things from falling out even while exercising.
- Used mesh fabric for the underarms to ensure breathability.
- Inserted gussets around the underarms to make it easier to raise and lower the arms.
items.name: MEN Ultra Stretch Active Jacket
items.shortDescription: A high-performance item approved by athletes. Stretchy and quick-drying, and made with convenient details.

items.longDescription:
- Made with 13 ounce Kaihara denim.
- Shading, wrinkles, and glaze produced with the latest processing technology developed independently at our Jeans Innovation Center to give them a worn, vintage feel.
- With a vintage, lived-in feel.
- Produced with a waterless wash method developed independently by our Jeans Innovation Center that reduces the water used by 90% or more.
- Adjusted the angles of the back pockets and positioned the front pockets slightly higher up so that your legs look longer.
- A straight, leg-lengthening cut from the knee down to the hem.
- Mid-rise jeans that are comfortable and fit well.
- Carefully designed details, such as buttons, rivets, stitch color, and pocket lining that suit the vibe.
- Used a denim textile with a vertical grain for the back yoke to enhance comfort.
items.name: MEN Slim Fit Jeans
items.shortDescription: Slim-fit with an authentic denim-like look.

items.longDescription:
- Made with comfort stretch denim, they are both flexible and authentic looking.
- This season's updated design was to revise all the patterns including the knee position and creating a refined, slim, long, straight look.
- A little extra depth was added to the hips for better comfort.
- The front pockets are slightly higher and the back pocket angles have been adjusted to accentuate your legs.
- A proprietary and unique distressing process, developed by the Jean Innovation Center's cutting-edge technology and jean-processing specialists, creates a timeworn, authentic look and feel.
- The buttons and rivet colors are made with natural, worn-in plating, so you'll love the details.
items.name: MEN Slim Fit Jeans
items.shortDescription: Combines comfort with an authentic texture. The patterns and details have been reviewed and further improved.
